thread.title: 3rd T20I: Start of match at Eden Gardens delayed due to rain
thread.title_full: 3rd T20I: Start of match at Eden Gardens delayed due to rain

title: 3rd T20I: Start of match at Eden Gardens delayed due to rain
text:
3rd T20I: Start of match at Eden Gardens delayed due to rain Published: Thursday, October 8, 2015, 18:32 [IST] Facebook Twitter Google+ Comments Mail 
Kolkata, Oct 8: The start of 3rd and final Twenty20 International between India and South Africa was delayed due to rain at Eden Gardens on Thursday. 
The coin toss was to take place at 6.30 PM IST but it has been delayed due to waterlogging on the ground. The ground was wet due to rain in the afternoon. A file picture of Eden Gardens 
Though there was no rain in the evening (latest at 6.30 PM), the umpires decided to have an inspection at 7.30 PM IST. 
South Africa have already won the series with a 2-0 lead. They were victorious in Dharamsala and Cuttack. The 2nd T20I was marred by bottle-throwing incidents at Barabati Stadium. 
OneIndia News
